Hey there,
We have received a request from the office of the dean at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology for information regarding a violation of the school’s academic integrity policy. This email is to inform you that we will be complying with their request.
Use of the Chegg Study service to complete assignments without gaining comprehension of subject matter is something we don't support. You may not use any of the solutions, answers, materials or information available on or through our Websites and Services, to cheat. Examples include:
1. Submitting any textbook solutions or tutorials from the Website as your own to any class.
2. Using our questions and answers service to complete tests or homework when instructed not to use outside help.
3. Otherwise passing along any solutions, answers, materials or information from the Website as your own.
4. Any other violation of your instructor’s or school’s academic honor code.
If Chegg is presented with evidence that its services have been used in a manner contrary to its Honor Code, Chegg may, in its sole discretion, remove the materials and terminate the accounts of the involved users.

Best,
Chegg Honor Code

《齊與史維校長賀獨立日》
{Celebrate Independence Day with President Weishyy}

讓我們齊來與史維校長慶賀他國家的獨立日，這天是美利堅合眾國宣佈獨立宣言的紀念日。這天提醒我們自由與自我決定的重要性。科大學生會希望所有科大人能渡過一個快樂的週末。

Let us celebrate the Independence Day with President Weishyy, a US holiday which commemorates her Declaration of Independence. We are reminded today of the values of self-determination and liberty. The Students’ Union wishes all USTers a happy weekend.
